props.title: Sign in to Companies House account

props.children: Sign in to your Companies House account

IDToken1.label: Email Address
IDToken1.hint: You cannot use your WebFiling details to sign in. You must sign in to or create a Companies House account.

IDToken2.label: What is the company number?
IDToken2.hint: Enter the registration number of the company you want to access in WebFiling.

props.children: You can find this by searching for the company on the
Companies House register (opens in a new tab)

props.title: Confirm this is the correct company

props.children: Confirm this is the correct company
This is a 6 character code issued by us to each company. The code is used to authorise online filings.

props.title: Add this company to your Companies House account

IDToken1.caption: Test
IDToken1.label: Do you want to add this company to your Companies House account?

props.summary: Benefits of adding this company to your Companies House account

props.children: By adding this company to your account, you:

items: will not need to re-enter the company's authentication code for most online filings
can authorise other people to file on your behalf

props.children: We've sent a text message with a security code to
It may take a few minutes to arrive.

props.summary: I have not received a text message

props.children: The text message may take a few minutes to arrive.
If it does not arrive, you can
ask us to send you another text message

IDToken1.hint: This is the name that will be displayed in your account. It is up to you how your name is displayed, for example 'Dan Smith' or 'Daniel Smith'.

IDToken2.hint: We'll send a link to this email address to verify you have access to it.

IDToken3.hint: Add your mobile number to make your account more secure. We'll send a security code to this number by text message.

props.children: If you already have an account, you can sign in
We've sent a text message with a security code to
It may take a few minutes to arrive.

props.summary: I have not received a text message

props.children: The text message may take a few minutes to arrive.
If it does not arrive, you can
ask us to send you another text message

items: Select the verification link in the email.

props.children: The verification link will expire if you do not verify your email address within 7 days.
This page will update automatically when you select the link.

props.summary: I have not received an email

props.children: We need some text copy for this section as it is not specified what should be here in the prototype images.
You have successfully verified the email address
You can now close this page and return the previous webpage to view your account, or
An error occurred during the registration process. To continue, please click the link below and start the registration process again with a different email address.
Click here to try a different email address
We are very sorry, an unexpected error occurred on the server. Please try again later.
You have reached the limit on the number of times an incorrect value can be tried.

dynamicProps.title: Important
dynamicProps.heading: Your password needs to be updated. Please follow the instructions.

props.children: Enter the email address you used to create your Companies House account. We'll send you a link so you can reset your password.
How do you want to confirm it's you?
Before you can make changes to your account, we need to confirm it's you. This helps us keep your account secure.
We've sent you a text message with a security code to
It may take a few minutes to arrive.

props.summary: I have not received a text message

props.children: The text message may take a few minutes to arrive.
If it still has not arrived, you can
ask us to send you another text message

IDToken1.hint: This must be at least 8 characters long and hard to guess.

props.children: which contains link to reset your password.
The link will expire in 6 hours.

props.summary: I have not received an email

props.children: The email may take a few minutes to arrive. Its subject link is 'Reset your password - Companies House account'.
Check your junk folder. If it still has not arrived, you can
ask us to send you another email
If you have given us the wrong email address, you can
give us a different email address
Unable to find account with those details
We were unable to find an account with those details.
Give us a different account username

IDToken2.label: What is the company number?
IDToken2.hint: Enter the number of the company you would like to add to your Companies House account

props.children: You can find this by searching for the company on the
Companies House register (opens in a new tab)

props.title: Confirm this is the correct company

props.children: Confirm this is the correct company
This is a 6 character code issued by us to each company. The code is used to authorise online filings.

dynamicProps.url: /account/your-companies/?notifyTitle=Success&notifyHeading=${company.name} has been added to your account.&notifyType=success

props.children: Do you want us to send the authentication code to the registered office address?
We'll send the authentication code by post to:
It can take up to 5 days to arrive.

props.title: Success
props.heading: The authentication code for FLOWERS LIMITED will be posted to the registered office address.
props.children: It usually takes up to 5 days to arrive.
View and manage your companies and the people authorised to file on behalf of a company.
To receive notifications about a company, search for a company on the Companies House register and use the 'Follow a company' service.
Requests for authorised people to file on behalf of a company will appear here.
Search for company information on the Companies House register.
Receive email alerts about a company's activity.

dynamicProps.title: Success
dynamicProps.heading: You've successfully updated your mobile number.

props.children: Make changes to your details and account settings

dynamicProps.heading: An email request has been sent to ${invitedUser} to be authorised to file online for ${companyName}

props.children: View and manage the companies you have added to your account, and people authorised to file on behalf of a company.
You have not added any companies to this account
If you want to file for a company, you'll need to add it to your account.
People authorised to file for this company

dynamicProps.children: Authorise a person to file online for this company
We have sent an email to ${user.mail}. This person must select the request link in the email so that they can file online for ${company.name}.

props.children: Remove authorisation to file online for this company
Your session has timed out, please log back in.

IDToken3.label: Enter a new password
IDToken3.hint: This must be at least 8 characters long and hard to guess.

props.children: You can use numbers, symbols and spaces.
A good way to create a secure and memorable password is to use 3 random words.
